description: Remove column ``Column 3``
Rename column ``Column 1`` to ``BIB Number``
Trim whitespace from cells in column ``BIB Number``
Remove indicators and extra spaces from cells in column ``Column 2``
Rename column ``Column 2`` to ``Fields``
Rename column ``Column 4`` to ``Values``
Remove rows where ``Values`` contains a space
Remove 856 fields for LC catalog enhancement links
Create column ``Numbering`` combining the values of ``BIB Number`` and ``Fields``
Create column ``Keep Number`` with the number of times the value in ``Numbering`` appears
Blank down cells in column ``Numbering``
Create column ``Number`` with the row number for the value in ``Numbering``
Turn values in ``Keep Number`` to text
For fields repeated in a record, add row number to value of ``Fields``
Remove column ``Numbering``
Remove column ``Number``
Remove column ``Keep Number``
Divide values in column ``Values`` into new rows at each `$$`
Fill down cells in column ``Fields``
Fill down cells in column ``BIB Number``
Remove rows with null value in ``Values``
Add subfield delimiter and code to value in ``Fields``
Remove subfield code from ``Values``
Create column ``No Field Number`` with the field and subfield code for the rowâ€™s value
Remove rows for subfields other than 020$a, 020$q, 020$z, 035$a, 245$a, 245$b, 245$n, 250$a, 599$a, 776$i, 776$z, 845$u
Blank down cells in column ``BIB Number``
Remove ISBD punctuation from end of 245$a and 245$b values
Revert all URL escape characters to their actual values in ``Values``
Combine values of ``Fields`` and ``Values`` with `]|[` between
Remove column ``Fields``
Create column ``Pivot`` with BIB number and record row number
Pivot table to create column with names of values in ``No Field Number`` containing values from ``Values``
Put columns in order of use
Remove MARC code from values in ``245$a``
Remove MARC code from values in ``245$b``
Remove MARC code from values in ``245$n``
Remove MARC code from values in ``250$a``

Blank down cells in column ``Title``
Remove column ``245$a``
Remove column ``245$b``
Remove column ``245$n``
Remove column ``250$a``
Pivot all MARC tag column names into column ``Fields`` and the corresponding values into column ``Values``
Fill down cells in column ``BIB Number``
Remove column ``Pivot``
Remove rows with no values
Blank down cells in column ``BIB Number``
Create empty column ``Temp``
Copy Ebook Central URLs from ``Values`` into ``Temp``
Copy MyiLibrary URLs from ``Values`` into ``Temp``
Copy Ebrary URLs with `=` from ``Values`` into ``Temp``
Copy Ebrary URLs without `=` from ``Values`` to ``Temp``
Copy Ebook Library URLs from ``Values`` into ``Temp``
For records with no value in ``Temp``, copy DOI URLs from ``Values`` to ``Temp``
Create column ``URL Domain`` with the domain of the URL in ``Temp``
Add domains ending with characters other than `/` to ``URL Domain``
Create column ``URL ID`` with DOIs extracted from platform URLs for records with no values in ``Temp``
For rows with DOIs extracted from platform URLs in ``URL ID``, make value of ``URL Domain`` `DOI`
Create column ``Equals`` with the number of equals signs in the URL in ``Temp``
Add `None Relevant` to ``URL Domain`` for all the records that still don't have a URL
Blank down `None Relevant` values in column ``URL Domain``
For 035 and 599 field rows, split column ``Values`` at MARC tag delimeter `]|[`
Remove column ``Values 1``
Split column ``Values`` at opening parentheses
Create column ``001 ID Source`` with contents of parenthetical at end of 035 or 599 field
Create column ``Unofficial 001 ID Source`` containing the letters at the beginning of 035$a or 599$a values that didn't have parentheticals
Create column ``001 ID`` with numerical values from 035$a and 599$a values that didn't have parentheticals
Split column ``Values 2 2`` at closing parentheses
Add contents of parentheticals to ``001 ID Source``
Add the letters at the beginning of 035$a or 599$a to column ``Unofficial 001 ID Source``
Add numerical parts of 035$a and 599$a to ``001 ID``
Remove column ``Values 2 1``
Remove column ``Values 2 2 1``
Remove column ``Values 2 2 2``
